entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Stirling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:16 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:16 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.9°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 93 %

Dewpoint: -1.9°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or periods of snow mixed with freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets overnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with ice pellets early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:04 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
